triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper surveys verification methods for deep reinforcement learning, the core subject of the survey.

triples.name: Deep neural network
triples.relevance: Deep reinforcement learning relies on DNNs as function approximators, and verifying these black-box networks is central to DRL verification.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification methods are the primary techniques surveyed for verifying DRL systems with mathematical guarantees.

triples.name: Robustness (computer science)
triples.relevance: Robustness is one of the key system properties that DRL verification methods must ensure in real-world applications.

triples.name: Safety-critical system
triples.relevance: Safety-critical systems require rigorous verification, motivating the need for DRL verification methods in consequential domains.

triples.name: Stochastic process
triples.relevance: DRL environments often exhibit stochastic behavior requiring verification methods to account for probabilistic dynamics.
